channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: An individual can change an organization
item.description:
I learned from Drew to put limited value in seniority. I learned that it's ok to debate. I learned to be persistent when I wanted change.

item.title: My Truck Desk
item.description:
I went into the machine shop. Really it mostly comes down to that first thing: finding time. ” What does that mean.

item.title: Why AC is cheap, but AC repair is a luxury
Tell HN: X is opening any tweet link in a webview whether you press it or not
item.description:
Thought other traffic-monitors might appreciate this explanation. Meanwhile Nikita Bier is pretending they never suppressed tweets with links to begin with, offering the alternative explanation: "a common complaint is that posts with links tend to get lower reach. They suppressed all links shortly after.

Read more

item.title: Once Australia's second priciest city, Melbourne has become more affordable
item.description:
With more listings and less competition from property speculators helping to make Melbourne more affordable, should the rest of Australia emulate the state’s housing policies. With more listings and less competition from property speculators helping to make the city more affordable, should the rest of Australia follow suit. More construction has meant more homes on the market in Melbourne, keeping property listings hi.
